item.title: Classroom Analytics
item.description: Analytics for face-to-face and hybrid courses For courses that are taught in the traditional face-to-face manner it can sometimes be trickly to collect enough data for a proper analysis. \(\chi^\color{red}2\)â€™s Classroom Analytics bridges the gap between online and face-to-face, and provides an important suplement to hybrid courses.
